description: instance_update in conductor/manager.py doesn't identify the service when calling notifications.send_update(), resulting in mesages on the notification queue having a service value of None.
title: instance.update notifications don't always identify the servicev

comments.content: instance_update in conductor/manager.py doesn't identify the service when calling notifications.send_update(), resulting in mesages on the notification queue having a service value of None.
